docs.lead_paragraph: Everything you always wanted to know about sex and the G.O.P. (but were afraid to ask).

headline.seo: Scaring the Voters in the Middle
headline.main: Scaring the Voters in the Middle
headline.print_headline: Scaring the Voters in the Middle

docs.abstract: NIcholas D Kristof Op-Ed column expresses astonishment that Republicans have adopted an absolutist platform with respect to abortion; calls on Mitt Romney to clearly explain his position on abortion, which so far has been murky.
docs.snippet: Everything you always wanted to know about sex and the G.O.P. (but were afraid to ask).

docs.lead_paragraph: Having spent seven years working as a legal-services attorney in public-housing developments throughout Chicago, I recognize the chaos described by Paul Tough in his article about Roseland. But what I also saw in my work was a working mother who, despite her extreme poverty, kept her apartment spotless and rose before dawn to get her family ready for school and work; and a tenant leader who, despite her organization being dissolved by the housing authority, went to her of ce each day to continue to help residents. We must not further disempower people by failing to acknowledge the work already under way from within their community. NICKI BAZER, Evanston, Ill.
